BertopicR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    bertopic

    create top terms charts for topic modelling completed using bertopic

    viz_top_terms.Rd

    create top terms charts for topic modelling completed using bertopic

    Usage

    viz_top_terms(
merged_df,
text_var = text_clean,
 topic_var = topic,
stopwords = TRUE,
hashtags = TRUE,
mentions = TRUE,
top_n = 15,
n_row = 2,
min_freq = 25,
include_outliers = FALSE,
type = "lollipops")

    Arguments

    merged_df

    df output from makedf function.Can be any df that includes a topic column

    text_var

    text top terms to be extracted from

    topic_var

    column containing topic variable

    stopwords

    remove (english) stopwords?

    hashtags

    remove hashtags?

    mentions

    remove mentions?

    top_n

    number of terms to extract

    n_row

    number of rows the plots should take up

    min_freq

    minimum number of times a term should appear for it to be considered

    include_outliers

    include the -1 (outlier) bertopic category

    type

    lollipop or bar chart?

    Value

    list of all_terms and max_only top term bar charts
